name: Pixela Project
summary: A PIXELA file is a project created by Pixela, a program used to create and edit pixel art sprites. It contains a project that consists of multiple layers of images drawn by a user. PIXELA files are saved in a lossless format, similar to .PNG files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PIXELA file open in 2DD Entertainment Pixela 1
images.alt: PIXELA file open in 2DD Entertainment Pixela 1
